channel.title: robotframework on Home
channel.description: Recent content in robotframework on Home

item.title: Robot Framework 1
item.description: In my new job role as a Test Engineer, knowing how to use Robot Framework for Automating Test Cases is crucial, to save time and to make testing more fun! As I’m going through this learning journey, I wanted to blog about it for anyone who is looking to start this journey and also to help me understand things in a better way. There are plenty of good resources out there which explains the Robot Framework and it’s components.
